title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Multimodal Scientific Discourse Instructional Design for English Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level science foundational knowledge and intermediate English communication skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can execute multimodal representations combining oral language, gestures, and visual aids to explain scientific concepts
Learners can recognize the differences between scientific discourse and everyday language and apply context-appropriate language-switching strategies
Learners can collaboratively complete and present multimodal science projects (including visual materials) with peers
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
